// THIS FILES IS GENERATED USING SCRIPT, DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY
const margin = function(value) {
  return {
    marginTop: value,
    marginBottom: value,
    marginLeft: value,
    marginRight: value,
  };
};
const padding = function(value) {
  return {
    paddingTop: value,
    paddingBottom: value,
    paddingLeft: value,
    paddingRight: value,
  };
};
const borderRadius = function(value) {
  return {
    borderTopLeftRadius: value,
    borderTopRightRadius: value,
    borderBottomLeftRadius: value,
    borderBottomRightRadius: value,
  };
};
const borderWidth = function(value) {
  return {
    borderTopWidth: value,
    borderBottomWidth: value,
    borderRightWidth: value,
    borderLeftWidth: value,
  };
};

export default {
  longhandUtils: {margin, padding, borderRadius, borderWidth},
  utilities: %%UTILITIES%%
}
